sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment">payment_idISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto Payment ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    if (!current.u_payment_id) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment');
        gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var newNumber = 1;
        if (gr.next() && gr.u_payment_id) {
            var lastNum = parseInt(gr.u_payment_id.toString().replace(/\D/g,''), 10);
            newNumber = lastNum + 1;
        }

        current.u_payment_id = 'PAY' + ('000' + newNumber).slice(-4);
    }

})(current, previous);

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-04 14:05:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f5682d983b322107f443dfb0fda1e93</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Payment ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0f5682d983b322107f443dfb0fda1e93</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-04 14:44:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0f5682d983b322107f443dfb0fda1e93"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_d0a6c353836b22107f443dfb0fda1e79
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Payment ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    if (current.isNewRecord()) {
       
        var prefix = "PAY";


        var gr = new GlideRecord("x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment"); 
        gr.orderByDesc("Payment ID"); 
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var nextNumber = 1;
        if (gr.next()) {
            // Extract number part (e.g., from PAY005  5)
            var lastId = gr.u_payment_id.toString();
            var lastNumber = parseInt(lastId.replace(prefix, ""), 10);
            nextNumber = lastNumber + 1;
        }

        // Format with leading zeros (3 digits: 001, 002, ...)
        var formattedNumber = ("000" + nextNumber).slice(-3);

        // Assign new ID
        current.u_payment_id = prefix + formattedNumber;
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-29 13:20:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d0a6c353836b22107f443dfb0fda1e79</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Payment ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d0a6c353836b22107f443dfb0fda1e79</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-29 13:22:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d0a6c353836b22107f443dfb0fda1e79"/></record_update>

    if (!current.booking_id) {
        var uniqueId = gs.generateGUID(); // Or use a custom format
        current.booking_id = "BOOK-" + uniqueId.substr(0, 8).toUpperCase();
    }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_87692a4b836f22107f443dfb0fda1eaa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bus</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Bus ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Only generate if empty
    if (!current.bus_id) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_your_scope_bus'); // replace with your actual table name
        gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var lastNumber = 0;
        if (gr.next()) {
            var lastId = gr.bus_id + '';
            lastNumber = parseInt(lastId.replace('BUS', ''), 10) || 0;
        }

        var newId = 'BUS' + (lastNumber + 1).toString().padStart(4, '0');
        current.bus_id = newId;
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anisha G</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-28 16:33:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>87692a4b836f22107f443dfb0fda1eaa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Bus ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_87692a4b836f22107f443dfb0fda1eaa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Anisha G</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-28 16:33:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=87692a4b836f22107f443dfb0fda1eaa"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1924cedc83f722107f443dfb0fda1e71
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bookings</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Booking ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Only run when inserting new record
    if (current.operation() != 'insert') {
        return;
    }

    // Find the last Booking ID
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bookings'); // change table name if needed
    gr.orderByDesc('booking_id'); // your field name
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();

    var lastNumber = 0;
    if (gr.next()) {
        var lastId = gr.booking_id.toString(); // example: "B005"
        lastNumber = parseInt(lastId.replace('B', ''), 10);
    }

    // Generate next Booking ID
    var newNumber = lastNumber + 1;
    var newId = 'B' + newNumber.toString().padStart(3, '0');

    // Set it on the record
    current.booking_id = newId;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Sivadharane S</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-01 11:02:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1924cedc83f722107f443dfb0fda1e71</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Booking ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1924cedc83f722107f443dfb0fda1e71</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Sivadharane S</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-06 07:34:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1924cedc83f722107f443dfb0fda1e71"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8134f717836f22107f443dfb0fda1ecf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bus</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto generate Bus ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    var fieldName = 'bus_id';
    var prefix = "BUS";

    if (!current[fieldName]) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bus');
        gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var nextNumber = 1;
        if (gr.next()) {
            var lastID = gr[fieldName].toString();
            var numericPart = parseInt(lastID.replace(prefix, ''), 10);
            if (!isNaN(numericPart)) {
                nextNumber = numericPart + 1;
            }
        }

        current[fieldName] = prefix + nextNumber.toString().padStart(3, '0');
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anisha G</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-29 16:38:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8134f717836f22107f443dfb0fda1ecf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto generate Bus ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8134f717836f22107f443dfb0fda1ecf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Lakshitha RE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-13 14:05:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8134f717836f22107f443dfb0fda1ecf"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bookings</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Booking Id</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    if (current.operation() != 'insert') {
        return;
    }

    // Find the last Booking ID
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_bookings'); 
	gr.orderByDesc('booking_id');
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();

    var lastNumber = 0;
    if (gr.next()) {
        var lastId = gr.booking_id.toString(); // example: "B005"
        lastNumber = parseInt(lastId.replace('B', ''), 10);
    }

    // Generate next Booking ID
    var newNumber = lastNumber + 1;
    var newId = 'B' + newNumber.toString().padStart(3, '0');

    // Set it on the record
    current.booking_id = newId;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2668577a83fb22107f443dfb0fda1e85
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0.DashboardUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>DashboardUtils</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var DashboardUtils = Class.create();
DashboardUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    /**
     * Get count of records from specified table with optional filter
     */
    getTableCount: function() {
        var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
        var filter = this.getParameter('sysparm_filter');
        
        gs.info('DashboardUtils.getTableCount called for table: ' + table + ', filter: ' + filter);
        
        try {
            // Check if table exists
            if (!GlideTableUtils.tableExists(table)) {
                gs.error('Table does not exist: ' + table);
                return JSON.stringify({
                    success: false,
                    error: 'Table does not exist: ' + table,
                    count: 0
                });
            }
            
            var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
            
            // Apply filter if provided
            if (filter && filter.trim() !== '') {
                gr.addEncodedQuery(filter);
            }
            
            gr.query();
            var count = gr.getRowCount();
            
            gs.info('Table ' + table + ' count: ' + count);
            
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: true,
                count: count,
                table: table,
                filter: filter
            });
        } catch (e) {
            var errorMsg = 'DashboardUtils.getTableCount error for table ' + table + ': ' + e.toString();
            gs.error(errorMsg);
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: false,
                error: errorMsg,
                count: 0,
                table: table
            });
        }
    },

    /**
     * Get today's revenue from payment table
     */
    getTodayRevenue: function() {
        var dateStr = this.getParameter('sysparm_date');
        
        gs.info('DashboardUtils.getTodayRevenue called for date: ' + dateStr);
        
        try {
            // Try different possible table names for payments
            var possibleTables = [
                'x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment',
                'x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payments',
                'x_cdltd_smart_tr_payment'
            ];
            
            var paymentTable = null;
            for (var i = 0; i < possibleTables.length; i++) {
                if (GlideTableUtils.tableExists(possibleTables[i])) {
                    paymentTable = possibleTables[i];
                    break;
                }
            }
            
            if (!paymentTable) {
                gs.warn('No payment table found. Tried: ' + possibleTables.join(', '));
                return JSON.stringify({
                    success: false,
                    error: 'Payment table not found',
                    revenue: 0
                });
            }
            
            var gr = new GlideRecord(paymentTable);
            
            // Filter for today's payments
            gr.addQuery('sys_created_on', 'ON', dateStr);
            
            // Try different possible state field names
            var stateQuery = gr.addQuery('state', 'completed');
            stateQuery.addOrCondition('status', 'completed');
            stateQuery.addOrCondition('payment_status', 'completed');
            
            gr.query();
            
            var totalRevenue = 0;
            var recordCount = 0;
            
            while (gr.next()) {
                recordCount++;
                // Try different possible amount field names
                var amount = 0;
                if (gr.getValue('amount')) {
                    amount = parseFloat(gr.getValue('amount')) || 0;
                } else if (gr.getValue('total_amount')) {
                    amount = parseFloat(gr.getValue('total_amount')) || 0;
                } else if (gr.getValue('payment_amount')) {
                    amount = parseFloat(gr.getValue('payment_amount')) || 0;
                } else if (gr.getValue('fare')) {
                    amount = parseFloat(gr.getValue('fare')) || 0;
                }
                totalRevenue += amount;
            }
            
            gs.info('Revenue calculation: ' + recordCount + ' records, total: ' + totalRevenue);
            
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: true,
                revenue: totalRevenue,
                date: dateStr,
                recordCount: recordCount,
                table: paymentTable
            });
        } catch (e) {
            var errorMsg = 'DashboardUtils.getTodayRevenue error: ' + e.toString();
            gs.error(errorMsg);
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: false,
                error: errorMsg,
                revenue: 0
            });
        }
    },

    /**
     * Get all available tables with the smart transit prefix
     */
    getAvailableTables: function() {
        try {
            var tables = [];
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
            gr.addQuery('name', 'STARTSWITH', 'x_cdltd_smart_tr_');
            gr.query();
            
            while (gr.next()) {
                tables.push({
                    name: gr.getValue('name'),
                    label: gr.getValue('label')
                });
            }
            
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: true,
                tables: tables
            });
        } catch (e) {
            gs.error('Error getting available tables: ' + e.toString());
            return JSON.stringify({
                success: false,
                error: e.toString(),
                tables: []
            });
        }
    },

    type: 'DashboardUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Anisha G</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-09 11:35:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>2668577a83fb22107f443dfb0fda1e85</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DashboardUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2668577a83fb22107f443dfb0fda1e85</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Anisha G</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-09 11:40:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6c8b83db836b22107f443dfb0fda1e91
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_payment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Payment ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    if (current.isNewRecord()) {
        var prefix = "PAY";

        // Query last record
        var gr = new GlideRecord("Payment"); // replace with your table name
        gr.orderByDesc("Payment ID"); // replace with your field name
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var nextNumber = 1;
        if (gr.next()) {
            var lastId = gr.u_payment_id.toString();
            var lastNumber = parseInt(lastId.replace(prefix, ""), 10);
            nextNumber = lastNumber + 1;
        }

        // Format number with leading zeros (3 digits)
        var formattedNumber = ("000" + nextNumber).slice(-3);

        // Set Payment ID
        current.u_payment_id = prefix + formattedNumber;
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-29 13:40:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6c8b83db836b22107f443dfb0fda1e91</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Payment ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6c8b83db836b22107f443dfb0fda1e91</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mounika Jaya Veerapalli</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-29 13:40:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6c8b83db836b22107f443dfb0fda1e91"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_15d50ec883bb22107f443dfb0fda1e0b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cdltd_smart_tr_0_gps_tracking</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate GPS Tracking ID</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    if (!current.number) {  // Only set if empty
        var gr = new GlideRecord(current.getTableName());
        gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.setLimit(1);
        gr.query();

        var lastNum = 0;
        if (gr.next() && gr.number) {
            var match = gr.number.toString().match(/\d+$/);
            if (match) lastNum = parseInt(match[0], 10);
        }

        var newNum = lastNum + 1;
        current.number = 'GPS' + newNum.toString().padStart(4, '0'); 
        // Example: GPS0001, GPS0002...
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Gangothri Madduru</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-31 16:30:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>15d50ec883bb22107f443dfb0fda1e0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate GPS Tracking ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Smart Transit Management System" source="x_cdltd_smart_tr_0">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Smart Transit Management System">95c1c60783ab22107f443dfb0fda1e1d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_15d50ec883bb22107f443dfb0fda1e0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Gangothri Madduru</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-01 13:33:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=15d50ec883bb22107f443dfb0fda1e0b"/></record_update>
